content: [My name is] Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: [I had this conversation with] Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: [The main topic of this conversation was] negotiating the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [The final price was] 700 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [On a scale from 1 to 10, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as] 8.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [During the negotiation, I did not feel] No [discriminated or offended].
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [There was no instance where I felt discriminated or offended because] the negotiation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner.
name: Yi-Nuo
